attributes.action: Nationalise WH Smiths to stop it from collapsing under its own absurdity
attributes.additional_details: Evidence compiled by @WHS_Carpet on Twitter - https://twitter.com/whs_carpet?lang=en
attributes.background: WH Smiths used to be the go-to shop for books, art supplies, and stationery. However, in recent years, its high street stores have devolved into chaos, riddled with shoddy carpeting (tears, tape etc), a poor range of products, and worst of all, 'deals' that often leave customer worse off.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the issues you raise are not the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament.
